net.sourceforge.aglets.itinerary
Interface TaskItinerary

All Superinterfaces:
Itinerary
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseCircularTaskItinerary, BaseTaskItinerary
public interface TaskItinerary
extends Itinerary

This interface defines an itinerary with task associated to each destination. Once the destination is reached the related task is executed.

Version:
1.0 13-set-2005
Author:
Luca Ferrari - cat4hire@users.sourceforge.net

Method Detail

addDefaultTask

boolean addDefaultTask(Task toExecute)
Adds a default task to the itinerary. A default task is executed on each destination of the itinerary, only on arrival of an agent.

Parameters:
toExecute - the task to execute on the arrival event
Returns:
true if the task has been added to the task list, false otherwise

removeDefaultTask

boolean removeDefaultTask(Task toExecute)
Removes a default task from the default task set.

Parameters:
toExecute - the task to be removed
Returns:
true if the task is removed, false otherwise (e.g., the task is not contained in the list).

addNextDestination

boolean addNextDestination(java.lang.String destinationURI,
                           Task toExecute)
Adds a couple destination, task, that means the destination will be added to the itinerary, and the task will be executed depending on the specified type

Parameters:
destinationURI - the destination of the itinerary
toExecute - the task to execute
Returns:
true if the task has been added, false otherwise

addNextDestination

boolean addNextDestination(java.lang.String destinationURI,
                           Task[] toExecute)
Adds a destination to the itinerary and several tasks to execute on such destination.

Parameters:
destinationURI - the destination of the itinerary
toExecute - the array of task to be executed (depending on the policy of the tasks).
Returns:
true if the destination is added, false otherwise

getTasksForDestination

Task[] getTasksForDestination(java.lang.String destinationURI)
Provides the array of tasks associated with the specified destination.

Parameters:
destinationURI - the destination to check
Returns:
the array of tasks associated with such destination.

addTaskForDestination

boolean addTaskForDestination(java.lang.String destinationURI,
                              Task toExecute)
Adds another task to the specified destination.

Parameters:
destinationURI - the destination the task must be associated to
toExecute - the task to execute
Returns:
true if the association is done, false otherwise

removeTaskForDestination

boolean removeTaskForDestination(java.lang.String destinationURI,
                                 Task toExecute)
Removes a task from a destination.

Parameters:
destinationURI - the destination the task must be de-associated.
toExecute - the task to remove
Returns:
true if the task has been removed, false otherwise.

removeAllTaskForDestination

boolean removeAllTaskForDestination(java.lang.String destinationURI)
Removes all tasks to be executed on a specified destination.

Parameters:
destinationURI - the destination to clean up
Returns:
true if all the tasks have been removed, false otherwise.

enableDefaultTaskExecutionOnArrival

void enableDefaultTaskExecutionOnArrival(boolean enable)
Sets the execution of tasks matched as EXECUTE_ON_DEFAULT on arrival.

Parameters:
enable - true if the tasks must be executed on the onArrival event, false otherwise.

defaultTaskExecutionOnArrival

boolean defaultTaskExecutionOnArrival()
The status of the execution of such tasks signed as EXECUTE_ON_DEFAULT for the onArrival event.

Returns:
true if the task will be executed due to the onArrival event, false otherwise.

enableDefaultTaskExecutionOnDispatch

void enableDefaultTaskExecutionOnDispatch(boolean enable)
Sets the execution of tasks matched as EXECUTE_ON_DEFAULT on dispatching.

Parameters:
enable - true if the tasks must be executed on the onDispatching event, false otherwise.

defaultTaskExecutionOnDispatch

boolean defaultTaskExecutionOnDispatch()
The status of the execution of such tasks signed as EXECUTE_ON_DEFAULT for the onDispatch event.

Returns:
true if the stats must be executed on the onDispatch event, false otherwise.

enableDefaultTaskExecutionOnRevertering

void enableDefaultTaskExecutionOnRevertering(boolean enable)
Sets the execution of tasks matched as EXECUTE_ON_DEFAULT on rectract.

Parameters:
enable - true if the tasks must be executed on the onRevertering event, false otherwise.

defaultTaskExecutionOnRevertering

boolean defaultTaskExecutionOnRevertering()
The status of the task execution of such taska signed as EXECUTE_ON_DEFAULT for the onRevertering event.

Returns:
true if the tasks must be executed on the onRevertering event, false otherwise.
